description: Takaki is the central character of the film. Because of his parents` jobs, he is forced to move a lot. He and Akari become close friends, but begin to drift apart when Akari moves away and they end up attending different junior high schools. In the second arc, he is shown to be an apt kyuudou practitioner and a member of his school`s kyuudou club.
name: Toono Takaki
